transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: give me nearest battle smart station

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Open the Battery Smart app and tap 'Find Station' for nearest locations with live battery availability.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I have smoke coming out of my battery what do I do

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Immediately stop using your scooter and visit the nearest Battery Smart station for a safe battery swap.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I have stop using my battery tell me the next thing

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Head to the nearest Battery Smart station for a swap - our team will replace it with a fully charged one.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I am in Sector 55 Gurgaon locate the nearest battery

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Check the Battery Smart app for nearest stations in Sector 55, Gurgaon - it'll show live availability and directions.

formatted_transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

Customer: give me nearest battle smart station

Agent: Open the Battery Smart app and tap 'Find Station' for nearest locations with live battery availability.

Customer: I have smoke coming out of my battery what do I do

Agent: Immediately stop using your scooter and visit the nearest Battery Smart station for a safe battery swap.

Customer: I have stop using my battery tell me the next thing

Agent: Head to the nearest Battery Smart station for a swap - our team will replace it with a fully charged one.

Customer: I am in Sector 55 Gurgaon locate the nearest battery

Agent: Check the Battery Smart app for nearest stations in Sector 55, Gurgaon - it'll show live availability and directions.
